song.englishname: Mighty is the Power of the Cross

english.segment1: What can take a dying man and raise him up to life again?. What can heal a wounded soul?. What can make us white as snow?. What can fill the emptiness?. What can mend our brokenness?. Brokenness
english.segment2: Chorus: Mighty, awesome, wonderful. Is the holy cross. Where the Lamb laid down His life. To lift us from the fall. Mighty is the power of the cross
english.segment3: What restores our faith in God?. What reveals the Father's love?. What can lead the wayward home?. What can melt a heart of stone?. What can free the guilty ones. What can save and overcome?. Overcome
english.segment5: It's a miracle to me (2x). and It's still a mystery (2x). It's a miracle to me. The power of God. For those who believe
english.segment6: Mighty, awesome, wonderful. Is the holy cross. Where the Lamb laid down His life. To lift us from the fall. Mighty is .... Mighty is.... Mighty is the power of the cross
english.segment7: Thank You for the cross (2x). Love the cross (2x). So Powerful... ohhhhh yeahhh. What can take a dying man?. And raise him up to life again?
english.segment8: Worship You Jesus. By your wounds we are healed. By your wounds we are saved. Mighty is the power of the cross (2x). Thank You Jesus for the Holy cross
